dt: {bc}a wavering between two or more possible courses of action {bc}{sx|irresolution||}

et: French {it}indécision{/it}, from {it}indécis{/it} undecided, from Late Latin {it}indecisus{/it}, from Latin {it}in-{/it} + {it}decisus{/it}, past participle of {it}decidere{/it} to decide
shortdef: a wavering between two or more possible courses of action : irresolution
